person.persName: John M. Ament (Maury County, Tennessee, postmaster and printer)

body.p: Maury County, Tennessee, postmaster. Tennessee native. Married Mary E. Brooks Ament in Maury County, Tennessee, on February 25, 1847. Father to John D. Ament, William A. Ament, Julia C. Ament, George N. Ament, Joseph Ament, and Antony Ament. Printer in Maury County in 1850. Postmaster of Hampshire in Maury County from December 21, 1859 to August 18, 1868.
